info.name: Green RX - Doctor Mobile App
info.description:
API Collection for Doctor Mobile App

**What Doctors Can Do:**
‚úÖ View ONLY patients who shared their link (not all patients)
‚úÖ View shared patients' medical histories & allergies
‚úÖ CREATE prescriptions with safety checks
‚úÖ Check drug interactions before prescribing
‚úÖ Record patient visits
‚úÖ Create medical reports
‚úÖ Review ADR reports
‚úÖ Manage appointments
‚úÖ View ratings & feedback
‚úÖ Access shared patient records via token
‚úÖ Suggest new medicines (admin reviews)

**Restrictions:**
‚ùå Cannot list all patients ‚Äì only those who shared access
‚ùå Cannot manage diseases/medications catalog

**Authentication:** All endpoints require Bearer token
**Base URL:** http://localhost:5000/api
